text: The following is a list of notable events and releases of the year 1894 in Norwegian music. ==Events== * Pianist Erika Nissen (1845-1903) is granted an artist's scholarship by the Norwegian state. ==Deaths== ; June * 1 – Sophie Dedekam, composer and diarist (born 1820). ==Births== ; April * 13 – Ludvig Irgens-Jensen, twentieth-century composer (died 1969). ==See also== * 1894 in Norway * Music of Norway ==References== Category:Norwegian music Norwegian Music Category:1890s in Norwegian music
title: 1894 in Norwegian music
